text: allahu manusyare avarute akramam mulam (utanati) pitikutiyirunnenkil bhumukhatt yatearu jantuveyum avan vittekkumayirunnilla. ennal nirnitamaya oru avadhi vare avan avarkk samayam nittikeatukkukayan ceyyunnatâ€Œ. annane avarute avadhi vannal oru nalika neram pealum avarkk vaikikkan avukayilla. avarkkat neretteyakkanum kaliyilla
